subject: Re: FW: Want to subscribe to newsletters
preview: Hi Heath    No other reports unfortunately or fortunately J Elizabeth did ask what browser but she didn't say.    I'll let you know if we hear anything else.    Thanks for looking into it.    Cheers

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath



No other reports unfortunately or fortunately J Elizabeth did ask what browser but she didn't say.



I'll let you know if we hear anything else.



Thanks for looking into it.



Cheers

Trish












Petricia Augustus

Head of Communications, Marketing and Operations



MS Research Australia

02 8413 7910 • 1300 356 467

paugustus@msra.org.au • http://www.msra.org.au/

Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

Hi Trish, 

All looks fine at our end as well. 

It appears to be isolated as we can't replicate. I'm assuming there have been no other reports at this stage?

Generally with a situation like this it's either human error or something on their individual computer like very outdating browser, firewall or some other security setting etc. 

I would be handy to know which browser it was?

Let me know?

Hi Heath


Can you please look into the below reported issue. The lady has advised that our subscribe button on the MS Research Australia website wasn't working for her. I have tested it on 3 different browsers so unfortunately can replicate the issue. Maybe you will have a better idea.


Thanks
Trish



Petricia Augustus
Head of Communications, Marketing and Operations


MS Research Australia
02 8413 7910 • 1300 356 467
paugustus@msra.org.au • www.msra.org.au
Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060




From: MSRA Enquiries

Subject: FW: Want to subscribe to newsletters


FYI - I had sent this one on to Nadya for her to subscribe Jane, just sending you this for the website issue.


Thanks,
Elizabeth

From: Jane Metlikovec [mailto:jane@welcomm.com.au]
Sent: Wednesday, 3 October 2018 1:30 PM
To: MSRA Enquiries <enquiries@msra.org.au>
Subject: Re: Want to subscribe to newsletters


Thanks Elizabeth,
And yes I was on the website: https://msra.org.au/
Thanks,
jane

On Wed, Oct 3, 2018 at 1:28 PM MSRA Enquiries <enquiries@msra.org.au> wrote:

Hello Jane,

Thank you very much for your email, we would love to subscribe you to our newsletter. We will get you signed up as soon as possible.

Thank you also for alerting us to the fact that we have an issue on our website - that is much appreciated. Could you please just clarify that you were on the website www.msra.org.au and also, which internet browser you were using? This will assist us to resolve the potential issue.

Thanks Jane, I look forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards,

Elizabeth

Could you please subscribe me?
